constituent: secret, wheat, cereal, invariably, heart, drop
koohiiStory1: The prize at the bottom of a cereal box is invariably a secret decoder ring.
koohiiStory2: A young couple meets in secret in the wheat field because their families are enemies. They cross their hearts and swear eternal - even if secret - love. Do not confuse with secrecy (#775).
myStory: chữ Bí. bí mật. cây lúa chắc chắn. nhất định có lúa cần bí mật. chữ bí và chữ tất.
words:
神秘(しんぴ): mystery
秘書(ひしょ): (private) secretary
秘密(ひみつ): secret, secrecy
